thread.title: Cops find 3 kilograms of cocaine after suspect in 3-car crash flees
thread.title_full: Cops find 3 kilograms of cocaine after suspect in 3-car crash flees

author: Steve Burns
title: Cops find 3 kilograms of cocaine after suspect in 3-car crash flees
text:
Georgia State Patrol officers found three kilograms of cocaine in a car abandoned by its driver after a pursuit that ended in a three-car crash, the GSP said.
Injuries were reported in the incident Thursday on I-285 West past Ga. 400.
The driver ran from the scene, across I-285 East, and escaped, the GSP said.
An investigation is ongoing.
In other news:
A $200 million sports complex is being built in Stonecrest.
